author: madcj1
title: Gem of Star Wars model ship
review:
Purchased this set as a gift to my son for xmas

Box/Instructions

Standard fair - excellent quality and easy to follow

 

Parts

Lots of gray with a smattering of black

Minifigures

Excellent - all are brilliantly executed, some of the best from any of the 50+ star wars sets we have !!

The build

I own over a 100 sets in multiple themes and for the piece count this was the best experience, the design is for me by far the best ship I have build outside an ultimate collectors model 

The completed model

Brilliant - walks all over the previous models by a country mile. Playability factor is easily a 5/5 - my son has not stopped swooshing it round his bedroom

Overall opinion

Excellent set for which I cannot recommend highly enough to anyone hesitating about buying this set - it made me write my first review
